body:
About first plan.

I thought that the first plan (HWIA has two mode) was good.
But I think this approach is no good now.
Because if HWIA has a flag about convert or no-convert, it isn't useful and this problem cann't be solved.

So, I thought the new plan.

We've had Hash#nested_under_indifferent_access already.
If Hash#nested_under_indifferent_access returns self, this hash isn't converted.

This idea's implementation is 759654e97d0e27ef0b5376b526564fb3da37354e , be3a7c7134a55fbcc12d6e66edd9ea524503c114 and 30baa5bd76153c3f8c83e9f7d60f42501a09b1fa .

759654e97d0e27ef0b5376b526564fb3da37354e is testcase for this problem.
be3a7c7134a55fbcc12d6e66edd9ea524503c114 is necessary because subclass_from_attrs method is called before assigning every attribute .
30baa5bd76153c3f8c83e9f7d60f42501a09b1fa is my new idea . 

If HashWithoutIndifferentAccess isn't good naming, please teach me proper name.
